ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or Healthy Request)
1 (2 ounce) pouch Campbell'sÂ® Dry Onion Soup and Recipe Mix
1 (3 pound) boneless beef bottom round roast or chuck pot roast
n: Campbell'sÂ® Slow Cooker Savory Pot Roast
des: "This tender pot roast is braised to perfection in a mixture of Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup, onion soup and recipe mix, carrots and potatoes."
ins:
Stir the soup, onion soup mix, potatoes and carrots in a 4 1/2-quart slow cooker. Add the beef and turn to coat.
Cover and cook on LOW for 8 to 9 hours* or until the beef is fork-tender.
